name: mqtt payload
timestamp

pixelNode message structure
set topic + payload
text lines
info:
0: Außentemperatur
 1: Innentemperatur
 2: temperatures today
 3: weather today
 4: temperatures tomorrow
 5: weather tommorow
 6: calendar "Müll"
 7: calendar "Papier"
 8: calendar "Gelber Sack"
 9: calendar "Biotonne"
10: way to work andreas
11: way to work undine
12: Pooltemperatur
13: S-Bahn Abfahrt 1
14: S-Bahn Abfahrt 2
15: current weather Brisbane
16: ...
17: ...
18: ...
19: ...
